Coupon_Type_Options.description: This type allows you to create a coupon applicable on individual item levels among items in the product universe
This type allows you to create a coupon with multiple SKUs and provide a discount basis final order value
This type allows you to create a coupon on group of SKUs
This type allows you to create a coupon that provides discount basis final order value.
This type allows you to create a coupon that provides discount basis final order value applied only once lifetime
